## Your Mission {.smaller}

Answer the following question using the data provided:

::: {style="text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; padding-top: 100px;"}
Was there a [**meaningful**]{.brand-triad-blue-red} difference in [**ultra-processed food consumption**]{.brand-triad-blue-red} among Brazilian children aged [**2 to 4**]{.brand-triad-blue-red} years in [**2022**]{.brand-triad-blue-red} across [**clusters B and D**]{.brand-triad-blue-red} of the Revised Multidimensional Index for Sustainable Food Systems ([MISFS-R](https://doi.org/10.1002/sd.2376))?
:::

::: {.notes}
:::


## MISFS-R Clusters {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column style="width: 50%; font-size: 0.95em;"}
The Multidimensional Index for Sustainable Food Systems (MISFS) is a tool designed to assess the sustainability of food systems at a subnational level in Brazil, incorporating local behaviors and practices.

The **MISFS-R** is a revised version that introduces new indicators and a refined methodology for calculating the index.

For more details, see @carvalho2021a and @norde2023.
:::

1\. Create a new Quarto project

2\. Formulate your hypothesis

3\. Perform a **pre-hoc** power analysis

4\. Download the data

5\. Inspect the data file

6\. Import the data into R

7\. Clean, tidy, and validate the data
:::

8\. Save the validated data

9\. Conduct a **brief** exploratory data analysis

10\. Conduct a t-test to compare the groups

11\. Calculate the effect size

12\. Perform a **post-hoc** power analysis

13\. Write your conclusions
